gamerule.keepInventoryMinItemsToDrop: Minimum items to drop on death
gamerule.keepInventoryMaxItemsToDrop: Maximum items to drop on death
gamerule.keepInventoryMinItemsToDrop.des: When Keep Inventory is enabled, this value will control the minimum amount of random items to drop from the player's inventory.
gamerule.keepInventoryMaxItemsToDrop.des: When Keep Inventory is enabled, this value will control the maximum amount of random items to drop from the player's inventory.
